subject: Re: Proposed parameterized test syntax for JUnit 4 - Constructor vs Method Parms
msgSnippet: ... Perhaps the Java TestCase constructor could take two parameters: java.lang.reflect.Method and Object[] parameters ^-  to be used to invoke the test method.
messageBody:
--- David Saff <saff@m...> wrote:
> [...], I find that having the parameters on the constructor
> reminds me of what's really going on.

Perhaps the Java TestCase constructor could take two parameters:
java.lang.reflect.Method
and
Object[] parameters
^- to be used to invoke the test method.
